title: React Developer
body:
Provided implementation, deployment and maintenance of the EasyCassa Web application, all-in-one cloud management services in the Sales Retail industry.
Developed new UI features based on Figma Designs and integrated them to the existing React components.
Optimised and resolved performance issues on pages, charts and complex forms.
Collaborated in an Agile environment with teams of Developers, UX/UI designers and QA Testers.

title: Web Designer
body:
In-house Funnel Builder and Web Designer building Sales Funnels for Italian and International Coaches.
Scaled Sales Funnels to â‚¬40K+ of sales in 2 months.
Enhanced functionality and appearance of website and increased sales by 10%.
Developed site navigation by funneling traffic through content.
Translated customer requirements into technical site concepts for bidding and initial planning purposes

title: Sales Funnels Builder
body:
Carried out day-to-day duties accurately and efficiently.
Worked flexible hours across nights, weekends and holidays.
Conducted research, gathered information from multiple sources (from top marketers like Russell Brunson, Gary Vaynerchuk, Tim Ferriss, Neil Patel etc.).
Developed site navigation by funneling traffic through content.
